content.question: Are you sure you want to delete your application?
content.deleted: All information you have provided will be deleted. If you apply again in future, you will have to pay the full fee for a new application.
content.userAccount: Your user account (which includes your email address and your password) will not be deleted. If you want your account to be deleted please contact the Divorce Centre.

deleteApplication.required: Select yes if you want to delete your application
